ExpSyntax.val: DataViewToText(0,'pDocType,DprArea,Reference,DocNum,DocStatus,PostDate,DocDate,AssetDate,Comments','Transaction Type,Depreciation Area,Reference,Document Number,Status,Posting Date,Document Date,Asset Value Date,Comments',{32768,84},';','',0)

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT DocEntry, DocType, DprArea, ObjType, UserSign, CreateDate, UserSign2, UpdateDate, CreatedBy, Reference, DocNum, DocStatus, PostDate, DocDate, AssetDate, Comments FROM OFTR (NOLOCK) WHERE (DocDate BETWEEN ':1' AND ':2') AND (DocNum LIKE '%'+':3'+'%') AND (DocType = ':4' OR ':4' IS NULL OR ':4' = '') AND (DprArea = ':5' OR ':5' IS NULL OR ':5' = '')

ExpSyntax.val: DataViewToText(0,'pDocType,DprArea,Reference,DocNum,DocStatus,PostDate,DocDate,AssetDate,Comments','Transaction Type,Depreciation Area,Reference,Document Number,Status,Posting Date,Document Date,Asset Value Date,Comments',{32768,84},';','',0)
